name: Luggage Baggage
description:
If you want to become a pack master and learn how to bag it like a professional, If you like to solve a luggage puzzle and organize the perfect suitcase, this game is for you. Packing can be fun and sometimes challenging, Luggage Baggage game allows you to experience both sides of this endeavor. In the easy mode, you will be able to organize colorful and beautiful items into different suitcases, in a relatively casual way, without too many pitfalls. In the more challenging game mode, you will have to be an expert in suitcase arrangement and master of the order, to bundle different objects and peculiar shapes, in a creative way inside a suitcase. Not all items are just pretty shapes, some of the items have a unique nature, some can break if you touch them too much, some items can rotate and give you full control of packaging freedom. The game never just let you wonder, there are game assistants who will help you to learn new aspects of the game. If you ever feel stuck, you can always request a hint, and continue puzzle through an arrangement of your suitcase. The game accompanied by music and sound effects. You can decide the exact volume of music and sounds, or even mute them. Luggage Baggage game also allows you to set reminders to play again, in the days and time that are convenient to you or turn the reminders off. You can always go back to any level that you won and play it again, maybe pack the suitcase faster or challenge yourself with fewer item manipulations.
We are waiting to hear your feedback, and improve.
